validation.minLength: {field} must be at least {min} characters long
validation.email: Must be a valid email address

errors.securityConfirmationRequired: Security confirmation required to modify 2FA settings
errors.securityConfirmationRequiredRemovePasske: Security confirmation required to remove passkeys
errors.securityConfirmationRequiredAddPasskeys: Security confirmation required to add passkeys
errors.securityConfirmationFailed: Security confirmation failed. Please verify your identity and try again.
errors.securityConfirmationExpired: Security confirmation has expired. Please verify your identity again.
errors.securityConfirmationTimeout: Security confirmation timed out. Please verify your identity again.
errors.otpInvalid: The code you entered is incorrect or has expired. Please try again.
errors.otpExpired: The verification code has expired. Please request a new code from your authenticator app.
errors.otpInvalidFormat: The code format is invalid. Please enter a 6-digit code.
errors.recoveryCodeInvalid: The recovery code you entered is incorrect or has already been used. Please try another code.
errors.recoveryCodeExpired: This recovery code has already been used. Please use a different recovery code.
errors.recoveryCodeNotFound: Recovery code not found. Please check your code and try again.
errors.twoFactorRequiredModifySettings: Two-factor authentication required to modify settings
errors.twoFactorRequiredRotateRecoveryCodes: Two-factor authentication required to rotate recovery codes
errors.twoFactorRequiredAddWebauthn: Two-factor authentication required to add WebAuthn
errors.rateLimitExceeded: Too many failed attempts. Please wait {minutes} minutes before trying again.
errors.rateLimitExceededGeneric: Too many failed attempts. Please wait a few minutes before trying again.
errors.networkError: Network connection error. Please check your internet connection and try again.
errors.authenticatorAppError: Unable to verify code. Please check that your authenticator app is working correctly and the time is synchronized.
errors.deviceTimeError: Your device's time appears to be incorrect. Please synchronize your device time and try again.
errors.backupCodeFailed: The backup code you entered is incorrect or has already been used. Please try another backup code or use your authenticator app.
errors.twoFactorSetupError: An error occurred while setting up two-factor authentication. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
